profile.name: Saul Goodman
profile.headline: Built a solo legal practice into a full-service firm through unconventional marketing and a 94% client retention rate. Specializes in criminal defense, elder law, and creative deal structuring.
profile.executiveSummary: Self-made attorney who transformed from a struggling public defender into the most recognized legal brand in the Southwest. Pioneered guerrilla marketing strategies for legal services, built a client base spanning criminal defense, elder law, and corporate advisory, and developed a reputation for creative problem-solving in high-stakes situations. Former mailroom clerk who passed the bar through sheer determination and unconventional intelligence.

workHistory.title: Managing Attorney
